headline: Crawford & Company names Bruce Swain as Interim President & CEO
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: "Chip, dive into what this leadership change means for Crawford & Company moving forward."

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: That headline certainly raises eyebrows and leaves us questioning the implications for the future.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: Bruce Swain's appointment as Interim President & CEO at Crawford & Company signals a strategic shift within the organization. It reflects the company's adaptability in response to market fluctuations and leadership challenges. Stakeholders will be closely watching how this change influences overall performance and corporate direction.

timeline.speaker: chip
timeline.text: Turning now to leadership updates within the industry.
